title: ‘Broccoli has to be hand cut’: Travel limits squeezing flow of seasonal workers to fruit, vegetable farms
description: From seeding through to harvesting, farmers need the help of 60,000 workers
content: Fruit and vegetable growers say sweeping new travel restrictions are cutting off the flow of seasonal labour to Canadian farms threatening to disrupt harvests as Ottawa bars foreign travellers in an attempt to contain the rapid spread of the coronavirus Pr chars
